view.gameplay

Class FortificationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.common.View
      • view.gameplay.FortificationView

  • public class FortificationView
extends View
    This class displays the fortification view and asks for inputs.
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen

      • chooseOriginCountry

        public int chooseOriginCountry(Player p)
        To choose the origin country using a correct number.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player.
        Returns:
        Returning the selected country number if the value of the input is incorrect.

      • chooseDestinationCountry

        public int chooseDestinationCountry(Player p)
        To choose the destination country using a correct number.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player.
        Returns:
        Returning the selected country number if the value of the input is incorrect.

      • askArmiesNumber

        public int askArmiesNumber(Player p,
                           int armiesMaxNumber)
        The method for showing the entered armies numbers and the changes. It also has several conditions for checking if the value is correct or not.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player.
        armiesMaxNumber - The max number of the army that the current player can send.
        Returns:
        Returning the total army number that the current player can be deployed.

      • errorOrigin

        public int errorOrigin(Player p)
        The method displays an error message for the origin country that is selected.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player.
        Returns:
        Returning the selected country number.

        The method for sending error message while sending armies
